description: Unique ID within NEON database; an identifier for the record
Unique identifier of the NEON domain
NEON site code
Name of the measurement location in the NEON database
An identifier for the set of information associated with the event, which includes information about the place and time of the event
Samples and/or measurements were not collected due to the indicated circumstance
The number for the sample replicate
The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area
The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84) of the geographic center of the reference area
Model used to measure horizontal position on the earth
The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the Location. Zero is not a valid value for this term
Elevation (in meters) above sea level
Uncertainty in elevation values (in meters)
The start date-time or interval during which an event occurred
The NEON document number and version where detailed information regarding the sampling method used is available; format NEON.DOC.######vX
Water depth at riparian assessment location
Width of the wetted stream at time of measurement
Left or right bank of a stream or river
Distance between the observer in the boat and shore
Visible distance in meters from bank or shore to end of riparian transect
Abbreviation for riparian subsystem
Abbreviation for vegetation class
Abbreviation for vegetation subclass
Plant code for dominant vegetation
Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined
Vegetation type for trees greater than 0.3 m diameter at breast height (DBH)
Vegetation cover class for trees greater than 0.3 m diameter at breast height (DBH)
Vegetation type for trees less than 0.3 m diameter at breast height (DBH)
Vegetation cover class for trees less than 0.3 m diameter at breast height (DBH)
Vegetation type for woody shrubs and saplings
Vegetation cover class for woody shrubs and saplings
Vegetation type for tall herbs, grasses and forbs
Vegetation cover class for tall herbs, grasses and forbs
Vegetation cover class for woody shrubs and saplings in ground cover
Vegetation cover class for short herbs, grasses and forbs
Cover class of standing water
Cover class of bare dirt
Presence or absence of buildings in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of roads in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of boat ramps in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of lawns or parks in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of agricultural activities in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of industrial activities in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of paved areas in a riparian transect
Presence or absence of trash in a riparian transect
Free form comments describing adjacent area on river left
Free form comments describing adjacent area on river right
Dominant bank angle
Subdominant bank angle
A yes or no indication of whether or not a bank edge is undercut
Dominant bank revetment
Subdominant bank revetment
Dominant bank texture
Subdominant bank texture
Technician notes; free text comments accompanying the record
An identifier for the technician who collected the sample or specimen
An identifier for the technician who recorded the data
Data quality flag
